title: Practice Challenge

hints.text: Object.keys(inventory).length for count, loop through Object.values() to sum

commonMistakes.consequence: Array indices come back as '0', '1', '2' not numbers.

commonMistakes.mistake: Trying to loop Object.values() with for...in
commonMistakes.correction: Use for...of with Object.values(): for (let val of Object.values(obj))

commonMistakes.mistake: Not using reduce for summing values
